basics.name: Parameswari Eddala
basics.summary: Hi, I am a Software Engineer with expertise in Python, Java, and C, specializing in automation frameworks and embedded systems. With hands-on experience in cloud platforms like AWS and advanced software development, I excel at delivering impactful, high-performance solutions. I am passionate about solving complex challenges and contributing to cutting-edge innovations in technology.

highlights: Prepare materials, organize lectures, and assist students in SQL.
Supported academic tasks and provided assistance in SQL and Python programming.
Guided students through complex problem-solving techniques in programming and database management.
Managed administrative functions, ensuring operational efficiency in coursework delivery.
Evaluate assignments, provide constructive feedback, and grade exams, improving academic performance.
Guide and support undergraduate students through tutoring and mentoring academic growth.

work.summary: Automation Testing for Google Access Points(GAP)
highlights: Automated testing for Google Home Application, enhancing reliability and stability for user experience.
Developed Python scripts for task automation, improving efficiency and reducing manual effort.
Collaborated on feature testing for Google Access Points, contributing to product stability.
Utilized Shell Scripting for job scheduling, enhancing operational efficiency.
Diagnosed and resolved complex DHCP server issues, ensuring uninterrupted network operations, and minimizing downtime for critical systems.
Partnered with cross-functional teams to conduct comprehensive feature testing for Google Access Points, contributing to enhanced product stability and performance.
Developed an ARM Cortex-based automated attendance system using UART, I2C, and Wi-Fi modules with code written in Keil.
Interfaced fingerprint sensors and RTC modules to manage time-stamped data.
Delivered a cloud-integrated system for efficient attendance management.
